name: GeographyChain-Themultiplayerwordgame
0:
”Alexa open geography chain”
”Alexa ask geography chain for rules”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: geography chain
des:
Geography chain is a party game meant to be enjoyed with friends. Test your knowledge on cities and country names around the globe. Try to chain as many names as possible. Don't worry this is not a memory game, it's just a knowledge game testing how well you know places around the globe. You can say the following phrases
- Alexa open geography chain
 ---------> a game of 2 --------> record spain
 ---------> rules
 ---------> leaderboards
- Alexa open geography chain and ask a game of 2
- Alexa open geography chain --------> how to play

There are more than 20,000 places in the database to choose from. In the future, geography chain will support more than these. A weekly tournament is held in a recurring fashion that starts every Friday. Winners from the competition will win trap cards to be used in the game locally. A future update will include this functionality. Thank you for supporting "Geography Chain". For any concerns, or feedback - feel free to contact support @ soupynoodles.dev.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
